Text.Page:
Ossugons. They infest the upper levels, and we need these towers clear! Eliminate {@LinkCreature:46#401#argonomorph ossugon warlords}, {@LinkCreature:46#402#argonomorph nightmare fiends}, and {@LinkCreature:46#403#argonomorph iskaragards}.

Report to {@Creature:246#1032} at {@Rgn:46017} once you've completed this simple, but dangerous task.
Keep up the good work, soldier.

Our target list consists of {@LinkCreature:46#401#argonomorph ossugon warlords}, {@LinkCreature:46#402#argonomorph nightmare fiends}, and {@LinkCreature:46#403#argonomorph iskaragards}. Signficant rewards for significant success.
